alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 12 at 3:12PM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN AND MUCH OF CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WESTERN AND ALL OF CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... .Critical fire weather conditions will continue across western and much of central North Dakota through early this evening. Northwest winds sustained to 35 mph with peak gusts as high as 60 mph are expected. Minimum relative humidity will drop to as low as 20 percent. Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and be difficult to control or suppress. Critical fire weather conditions are possible again on Thursday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... * WINDS...Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * AFFECTED AREA...Central North Dakota. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and become difficult to control or suppress.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells
